title: Tales of Maj'eyal + 2 DLC (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_tales_of_majeyal_2.8.0.10.exe"
- Navigate to the DLC folder and install the DLC 
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

DLC Included:
TALES OF MAJ'EYAL: ASHES OF URH'ROK
TALES OF MAJ'EYAL: EMBERS OF RAGE

Title: TALES OF MAJ'EYAL
Genre: Role-playing - Turn-based - Roguelike
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.7.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Text only: English
Features: single-player - achievements
Released: December 21, 2012
Size: 350.1 MB
Company: Netcore / Netcore
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/tales_of_majeyal

About:
Tales of Majâ€™Eyal is a roguelike RPG, featuring tactical turn-based combat and advanced character building. Play as one of many unique races and classes in the lore-filled world of Eyal, exploring random dungeons, facing challenging battles, and developing characters with your own tailored mix of abilities and powers.
With a modern graphical and customisable interface, intuitive mouse control, streamlined mechanics and deep, challenging combat, online stats and character sheets, Tales of Majâ€™Eyal offers engaging roguelike gameplay for the 21st century.
Focus on randomly generated tactical battles
Rich set of very unique classes
Unlocks & in-game achievements progression
Rich world with its own history which slowly reveal during the game
No consumables, no grinding
Turn based: think before you act!
Simple, easy to use interface.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any OpenGL capable video card. Hard Drive: 512 MB available space
Recommended system requirements - Windows: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2+ capable video card. Hard Drive: 512 MB available space
